level.heading: Establishment of the Commission on African Affairs.
level.text: There is established a Commission on African Affairs ("Commission") to advise the Mayor, the Council, the Director of the Office on African Affairs, and the public on the views and needs of the African communities in the District.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 1-523.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-111
level.text: For Law 16-111, see notes following ยง 2-1391.
